name: Xeno (Goose Eats God)
description:
You are the Xeno, an alien invader...

The only human on a distant alien space station light years from Earth.

Your mission is to cut through waves of alien lackeys, defeat the newly arrived Galactic Imperial Officer, and commandeer their ship to make your escape.

  • Mixes 2D and 3D art styles
  • Camera alternates perspective for more dynamic environments

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left Mouse Button to attack
  • press E to shoot your revolver, left click to fire (Choose when to use it carefully, you can only fire your gun once)
